architectural_notes: Backend deployments should support redeploying the draft backend as a new canister without changing unrelated (non-backend) components.
known_issues: Backend connection problem observed in the draft version (also previously reported in live).
Attempted draft backend redeploy failed due to a deployment/snack error ('We hit a snag with our language model').

new_feature_requests.summary: Deploy the current draft backend again as a brand-new canister (new canister ID), without changing the backend code/behavior, and without making any frontend changes.

projectName: Redeploy draft backend as a new canister (no non-backend changes)
